text: The Beattyville Grade School, located at 58 E. Center St. in Beattyville, Kentucky, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2008. It was built in 1940 according to the NRIS database, and in 1926 according to a housing rental website. It was converted into 18 apartments. It originally served grades 1-12, then served grades 10-5 until 1969. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Kentucky Category:School buildings completed in 1940 Category:Lee County, Kentucky Category:Schools in Kentucky
title: Beattyville Grade School
